description.value:
+10 to Survival Tests, Best Craftsmanship provides +20. May contain Fishing Gear, animal snares, firestarter tabs, flares, compass, signal mirror, water purification tablets, antibiotic and detox pills, insect repellent, sunscreen, Flextent Shelter, limited medkit, exposure cloth, multi-tool, disposable handgun, survival booklet, prayer scrolls, vox, combat blade and Rations.

Requirements

Relatively lightweight and transportable.

Effect: Rare

Notes: -
